code: import"../styles/CardMeal.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var CardMeal=function CardMeal(_ref){var image=_ref.image,name=_ref.name,link=_ref.link,user=_ref.user;var onSaveRecipe=function onSaveRecipe(){fetch("http://localhost:3000//favorites",{method:"put",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({id:user,recipe_name:name,recipe_url:link,recipe_image:image})}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(res){console.log(res);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"slide1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:"recipe_image"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"slide2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:[name," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:link,target:"_blank noreferrer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"btn_home",type:"button",children:"Recipe"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"btn_small",type:"button",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"fas fa-heart",onClick:function onClick(){return onSaveRecipe();}})})]})})]});};export default CardMeal;
